title: The Math Hoffa Interview: Joe Budden vs Adam, Dizaster Beef, Tax Stone & More
description:
While in New York, Adam sat down with Math Hoffa to catch up on pretty much everything, his beefs, his podcast grind, relationships and more!

---
00:00 Intro
3:35 Hoffa questions the kinda mentality you have to have to make songs about s_x all the time
7:50 Math is going thru it with his girl, doesn't wanna propose when the relationship isn't going well, Adam talks about the ring being the holy grail for women, what's after that?
9:18 Hoffa used to F girls in bathrooms before he met his girl
12:30 Now that Hoffa is single, possibilities are endless
13:48 Filming in a barber shop, just kinda worked out + Doing VR type of podcast experience
19:58 Akademiks getting backlash from hip hop legends for calling them "dusty"
23:16 Hoffa is shocked that he was able to go on the Breakfast Club just because of this
25:13 Hoffa and Adam not using money as metric to interview someone
25:18 "Talent is not business" if you're not ready to show up, do the work it won't be a business
29:33 Hoffa got that BBC who will get any girl coming to the hood
30:07 Adam says battle rap groupies have dirty feet, standing up for a whole battle is like a gym locker room
31:24 Adam asks if it's an issue that he's cool with Dizaster, Hoffa doesn't want to engage
32:12 Dizaster didn't want to link up with Hoffa to talk about it
34:08 Arguing about what karma and if it's a real thing
35:14 Battle rappers faking beefs to battle but get along in real life
39:14 Adam was very confident during his argument with Joe Budden, Joe was reaching, and then turns around and interview Bin Laden
43:32 Did Joe Budden get Adam scared to ask certain questions now?
44:38 Battle rappers hated when Hoffa started his podcast
46:23 People have a perception on battle rap, Hoffa says the hate from battle rap was actually a blessing
50:57 Game diss to Eminem was not good and not a good idea
52:08 Hoffa would sit down with Charleston White, but with someone like Mysone in the room
52:43 Managing cohosts when they ask stupid questions
56:40 Telling artists when it's too early for a big interview, most of them don't understand or got nothing to talk about
56:31 Adam says to save some interviews for certain platforms + The battle of who drops first between Adam and Vlad
1:00:06 Hoffa doesn't know what a glock dookie is
1:01:04 Hoffa says he's cordial with both sides, Budden and Rory/Mall
1:02:48 Rappers rapping about rap, Adam says it makes you sound dated, Hoffa says Adam is dissing Eminem
1:07:43 Hoffa imitates Pop Smoke
1:10:40 J-Hood's mom's house burned down back in the day, Adam thought every rappers were rich, also rappers telling Hoffa their chains is fake, like Baby from Cash Money
1:14:45 Should you buy a fake designer bag for your mom or your girl?
1:15:30 Cam'ron bars don't always land right, Adam doesn't wanna know if he was an actual shooter or nah
1:17:51 Hoffa and Adam sing along
1:18:36 Analyzing the rise of Taxstone, from the streets to his incarceration, he could have been the podcast king
1:27:34 Crying while podcasting, almost like a therapy session
1:32:17 Akademiks didnt word his comment properly but in the end this could turn into something positive, Adam can't take the pressure of backlash, it's not good for his mental health
1:34:46 Akademiks beefed with Meek Mill, Nicki, Rory & Mall, and nothing happened to his career
1:37:00 Necro barges in the podcast room

---

http://www.patreon.com/nojumper

content:encoded:
While in New York, Adam sat down with Math Hoffa to catch up on pretty much everything, his beefs, his podcast grind, relationships and more!


---

00:00 Intro

3:35 Hoffa questions the kinda mentality you have to have to make songs about s_x all the time

7:50 Math is going thru it with his girl, doesn't wanna propose when the relationship isn't going well, Adam talks about the ring being the holy grail for women, what's after that?

9:18 Hoffa used to F girls in bathrooms before he met his girl

12:30 Now that Hoffa is single, possibilities are endless

13:48 Filming in a barber shop, just kinda worked out + Doing VR type of podcast experience

19:58 Akademiks getting backlash from hip hop legends for calling them "dusty"

23:16 Hoffa is shocked that he was able to go on the Breakfast Club just because of this

25:13 Hoffa and Adam not using money as metric to interview someone

25:18 "Talent is not business" if you're not ready to show up, do the work it won't be a business

29:33 Hoffa got that BBC who will get any girl coming to the hood

30:07 Adam says battle rap groupies have dirty feet, standing up for a whole battle is like a gym locker room

31:24 Adam asks if it's an issue that he's cool with Dizaster, Hoffa doesn't want to engage

32:12 Dizaster didn't want to link up with Hoffa to talk about it

34:08 Arguing about what karma and if it's a real thing

35:14 Battle rappers faking beefs to battle but get along in real life

39:14 Adam was very confident during his argument with Joe Budden, Joe was reaching, and then turns around and interview Bin Laden

43:32 Did Joe Budden get Adam scared to ask certain questions now?

44:38 Battle rappers hated when Hoffa started his podcast

46:23 People have a perception on battle rap, Hoffa says the hate from battle rap was actually a blessing

50:57 Game diss to Eminem was not good and not a good idea

52:08 Hoffa would sit down with Charleston White, but with someone like Mysone in the room

52:43 Managing cohosts when they ask stupid questions

56:40 Telling artists when it's too early for a big interview, most of them don't understand or got nothing to talk about

56:31 Adam says to save some interviews for certain platforms + The battle of who drops first between Adam and Vlad

1:00:06 Hoffa doesn't know what a glock dookie is

1:01:04 Hoffa says he's cordial with both sides, Budden and Rory/Mall

1:02:48 Rappers rapping about rap, Adam says it makes you sound dated, Hoffa says Adam is dissing Eminem

1:07:43 Hoffa imitates Pop Smoke

1:10:40 J-Hood's mom's house burned down back in the day, Adam thought every rappers were rich, also rappers telling Hoffa their chains is fake, like Baby from Cash Money

1:14:45 Should you buy a fake designer bag for your mom or your girl?

1:15:30 Cam'ron bars don't always land right, Adam doesn't wanna know if he was an actual shooter or nah

1:17:51 Hoffa and Adam sing along

1:18:36 Analyzing the rise of Taxstone, from the streets to his incarceration, he could have been the podcast king

1:27:34 Crying while podcasting, almost like a therapy session

1:32:17 Akademiks didnt word his comment properly but in the end this could turn into something positive, Adam can't take the pressure of backlash, it's not good for his mental health

1:34:46 Akademiks beefed with Meek Mill, Nicki, Rory & Mall, and nothing happened to his career
